name: developer-kits
description: A collection of plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: claude-md-sync
plugins.description: Automatically keeps CLAUDE.md synchronized with project state. Detects project type, analyzes current state, and proposes documentation updates.

plugins.name: claude-mem0
plugins.description: Persistent memory for Claude Code using mem0 cloud API. Automatically captures and retrieves global user-level and project-level memories.

plugins.name: gui-agent-dev
plugins.description: Development toolkit for GUI automation agents with /dev command (6-step workflow), 8 agents (5 domain + 3 workflow), and code review skill.

plugins.name: plugin-updater
plugins.description: Check for updates to installed Claude Code plugins from the developer-kits marketplace
